ComicInfo.Title: Bend it Like Turtles
ComicInfo.Summary: Dheeraj, April O'Neil's first employee at the antique store, wants to become a better martial artist, but his brain keeps getting in the way of his fists. He thinks too much, and when it comes down to the wire he chokes. Luckily for him, Leonardo sees some potential in him and decides to give him some lessons in the way of the ninja!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-27 17:52:19. [CVDB232911]
ComicInfo.Colorist: Ramil Sunga, Rob Ruffolo, Shaun Curtis
ComicInfo.Characters: April O'Neil, Donatello, Leonardo, Master Splinter, Michelangelo, Raphael
ComicInfo.ScanInformation: Erik Sander (inker), James McDonough (production), LeSean Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Dreamwave e7b352579345c20a4e901dd7139872ac Anna’s Archive
